page.title: 11A Shopping Survey
page.content: A survey was made of people shopping in the two main shopping areas of Brockenhurst. Of the people interviewed 60 were visitors and 45 were locals. 65 people thought that the large influx of visitors made shopping more difficult in the summer but most agreed that the tourists helped to provide a better range of shops. 70 of the people questioned found Brockenhurst a very expensive place to shop but preferred paying a bit extra than travelling to Lymington or Lyndhurst. Most people did their main weekly shopping in Lymington although 16 do travel regularly to Southampton. 22 of the shoppers visit the hypermarket at Eastleigh on occassions.
